data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: General Skywalker bows low before Princess Leia. She ____ on a raised ____, ____ in ____ royal ____ of a planetary ____. The ____ sits ____ to ____ side ____ a ____ platform. The princess waits for a few moments before she allows the general to rise.
data.partBlankContent: General Skywalker bows low before Princess Leia. She si__ on a raised plat____, dre____ in t__ royal ro___ of a planetary ru___. The qu___ sits o__ to o__ side o_ a sma____ platform. The princess waits for a few moments before she allows the general to rise.
data.fullContent: General Skywalker bows low before Princess Leia. She sits on a raised platform, dressed in the royal robes of a planetary ruler. The queen sits off to one side on a smaller platform. The princess waits for a few moments before she allows the general to rise.
data.answer: 天行者将军向莱娅公主鞠躬。她坐在一个升高的平台上，穿着行星统治者的皇家长袍。女王坐在一边一个较小的平台上。公主等了一会儿，才让将军站了起来。
